articles.title: OpenAI and UK Government announce strategic partnership to deliver AI-driven growth
articles.description: OpenAI partners with the UK Government to boost AI adoption, drive economic growth, and enhance public services for a thriving AI ecosystem in the UK.

articles.title: AI as the greatest source of empowerment for all
articles.description: Iâ€™ve always considered myself a pragmatic technologistâ€”someone who loves technology not for its own sake, but for the direct impact it can have on peopleâ€™s lives. Thatâ€™s what makes this job so exciting, since I believe AI will unlock more opportunities for more people than any other technology in history. If we get this right, AI can give everyone more power than ever.

articles.title: Advanced version of Gemini with Deep Think officially achieves gold-medal standard at the International Mathematical Olympiad
articles.description: Our advanced model officially achieved a gold-medal level performance on problems from the International Mathematical Olympiad (IMO), the worldâ€™s most prestigious competition for young mathematicians. It earned a total of 35 points by perfectly solving five out of the six problems.
